body_html: One key concern that is left, is whether or not it's important to accumulate sums into doubles or not. On my local example (character rnn) this appears to make no difference. If someone needs that extra precision, they could also upcast all to doubles.

body: One key concern that is left, is whether or not it's important to accumulate sums into doubles or not. On my local example (character rnn) this appears to make no difference. If someone needs that extra precision, they could also upcast all to doubles.
